pages.text: Very sharp, very powerful.$(br2)And very expensive too. Better hope you've got a lot of diamonds you can turn into shards.$(br2)If your opponent lacks sufficient armor, you might be able to destroy them instantly.
$(o)Deals $(l)3.35$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information.
